reviewText: Amazing flashback!  The DVD was in great condition!
I can't watch this tape without a huge smile on my face. It reminds me of my childhood and riding with my whole family in the desert. I would make my dad play this over and over.
This is where it all started with freestyle and free riding. All natural terrain with no ramps, no fluff, no stadiums.
Cover looks great and plays great. I have nothing else to say on that subject Cool Video. D Da DA

Any gearhead that lives to see, hear and ride "things" with engines...especially those that consume premix (OMG that smell).  Will grasp this issue in their hands and raising it to the heavens scream outloud....BEAUTERUS!!
